answers.author: Cory Fleming
answers.text:
Hi Mauro - There are 311 and 7-digit contact centers in smaller communities.  The smallest that I'm aware of is in Gardiner, ME (pop. 5800).  I can pull together a list and e-mail it to you later this afternoon.

answers.author: Mercy Montgomery
answers.text:
Hi Mauro, 
The City of Hamilton, OH has a population of approximately 63,000. We use an online 311 system currently, but will be transitioning to provide a phone 311 system in the new year as part of our new "Customer First" focus.


Hi Mauro, 

The City of Hamilton, OH has a population of approximately 63,000. We use an online 311 system currently, but will be transitioning to provide a phone 311 system in the new year as part of our new "Customer First" focus.

author: Mauro Lopez
text:
Anyone work for a city with a population of 45,000 - 100,000 that has a 311 call service?
I'd like to know how it worked for you. 
Mauro
title: 311 Call Service for Mid-Sized City
